title: 10 Years of "Exclusive" Growth
description: Did the regional provinces experience the same economic growth as what the whole country experiences?

title: Circle of Nations
description: Which countries would more likely to join the same organizations? This was my final internship project for Interactive Things, a Switzerland based Data Visualization and UX Design studio.

title: Visualizing Philippine Tourism
description: Visualizing the Trends on Tourists and Travel Destinations in the Philippines by Local and Foreign Tourists.

title: Out of Reach
description: Visualizing income inequalities between countries and between income groups within countries. Created during my internship at Interactive Things. (external link)

title: Eurovision Country Voting
